item.description:
Who's hosting? Lauren, Margaret

Join use for a night by the sea in Milford.  Now that we're shoveled out, let's get together and have some fun!  Lauren has graciously invited us to her home for a Winter Party!   Let's help Vanessa celebrate her birthday along with any other February snow babies!

    LET'S HAVE A PARTY!

Lauren has asked that everyone bring their own alcoholic beverage and a dish of food to share.   Finger foods, hot dishes and deserts are some suggestions.  Paper goods, water and soda will be provided.   

 

Please ensure you show up if you RSVP "yes", since we may have a waiting list and you are taking up a persons spot if you do not show up.  If you must cancel, the earlier the better if there is a waiting list.   


*Please note* The address will be sent a few days prior to the event to "yes" RSVPs, due to this being a private residence.  It should go without saying to Drink Responsibly.  Only sign up on one site if you belong to more than one for an accurate count. 

Enjoy the night in fun, style and class. 

This event if from 6pm - 10pm.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Winter Party by the Sea... Milford!!
